alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Mayes; Nowata; Ottawa; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:29AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Craig, Rogers, northwestern Delaware, western Ottawa, Mayes, southeastern Washington, Nowata and northeastern Tulsa Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 529 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of South Coffeyville to near Watova to near Tulsa International Airport. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Claremore... Miami... Vinita... Nowata... Pryor... Owasso... Pryor Creek... Collinsville... Commerce... Chelsea... Salina... Oologah... Fairland... Afton... Quapaw... Langley... Adair... South Coffeyville... Welch... Bernice... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 244 and 313. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Craig; Delaware; Mayes; Nowata; Ottawa; Washington
